Apple

Facebook

I led a project to build a brand new internal marketing tool that allows the SMB team to manage relationships with their customers.

Symantec

I worked in the Trust department helping to refine tools that customers needed to setup or maintain online certificates for their businesses.

Lifograph

I consulted with an entreprenuer on taking the company's product, a networking platform for entreprenuers and investors, to the next level.

Type 1 Diabetes Foundation

I ran a project to build out an advanced portal that helps Type 1 Diabetes patients manage their care and communication with healthcare providers.

Hello friend! This website is about my recent design work but also inspired by my pre-digital inspirations, a fusion of my past and present that makes me whole. Reach out to talk to me about either as I would love to chat with you so we can work together or just meld ideas on great stories.
